mapper.select: select id, member_id, notification_type, notification_title, notification_content, notification_is_read, qna_id, experience_program_id, skill_log_id, created_datetime, updated_datetime from tbl_main_notification where member_id = #{memberId} and notification_type = 'qna' order by created_datetime desc

select id, member_id, notification_type, notification_title, notification_content, notification_is_read, qna_id, experience_program_id, skill_log_id, created_datetime, updated_datetime from tbl_main_notification where member_id = #{memberId} and notification_type = 'experience_apply' order by created_datetime desc

select id, member_id, notification_type, notification_title, notification_content, notification_is_read, qna_id, experience_program_id, skill_log_id, created_datetime, updated_datetime from tbl_main_notification where member_id = #{memberId} and notification_type = 'skill_log' order by created_datetime desc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_main_notification (member_id, notification_type, notification_title, notification_content, qna_id, skill_log_id) values (#{memberId}, #{notificationType}, #{notificationTitle}, #{notificationContent}, #{qnaId}, #{skillLogId})
mapper.update: update tbl_main_notification set notification_is_read = true, updated_datetime = current_timestamp where member_id = #{memberId} and notification_is_read = false
